titleStmt.title: A Copye of a letter contayning certayne newes, & the articles or requestes of the Deuonshyre & Cornyshe rebelles
titleStmt.author: R. L.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to R.L. by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
